ygData.subject: Re: new spell!?!?
ygData.msgSnippet: for those that do not read eqvault or dont ever log into the test server, here is the test patch msg (at least the info that pertained to wizzies): Wizard
ygData.messageBody:
for those that do not read eqvault or dont ever log into the test server,
here is the test patch msg (at least the info that pertained to wizzies):

"Wizard "Casting Times" for damage spells have been slightly reduced"
"New Wizard Spell "Bonds of Force" on Wizard vendors."
"Research for Thunderclap (Wizard) is now correct - check your book"
"Research for Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor (Wizard) is now correct - check your
book"

i logged on to the test server to see about our new spell, bonds of force,
but could not find it anywhere in neriak. if somebody else logs into the
test server, and finds the new spell, could u please post lvl requirement,
skill, and mana cost?

thx.
Sinlaru

-----Original Message-----
From: Neil Lambert <smartass@...>
To: EQ_Wizards <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, June 26, 1999 7:00 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] new spell!?!?


check EQvault for the patch update... apparently we have a new spell up
on the test server and it will be coming soon... wonder what it does...
